samples.question: So, do you think that possibly beauty companies should not be allowed to advertise to children?
samples.transcript: Probably yes because children's minds are not fully formed yet and their cognitive processes are still developing. Therefore, they might be way more vulnerable than any other group let us say of people towards these aggressive marketing actions. So I do believe that children especially young girls should not be a target for marketing campaigns.

Therefore, they might be way more vulnerable than any other group let's say of people towards these aggressive marketing actions. So I do believe that children especially young girls should not be a target for marketing campaigns.
samples.transcript_cleaned: Probably yes because children's minds are not fully formed yet and their cognitive processes are still developing. Therefore, they might be way more vulnerable than any other group let us say of people towards these aggressive marketing actions. So I do believe that children especially young girls should not be a target for marketing campaigns.

samples.question: Why is it that so many people equate beauty with youth?
samples.transcript: Well, there are cert there are several reasons for this. The first one is the way that youth is being promoted in the media. Like we consider people who do not have wrinkles, who have this who have these youthful features, beautiful. And that is partly because of the way that we are programmed biologically. like evolutionary people who are young are considered to be more viable and since they are they since they have more ability to prolong their life and to live a longer life they are considered to be more attractive towards for example other sexes or towards like their partners and etc. So I believe that there is a twist of evolution but also media also adds certain sprinkles of the way that we see how youth is equal to beauty.

samples.question: Now do you think that people that are beautiful or people's level of beauty can affect their success in life?
samples.transcript: Many in many ways we find that physically attractive people they are more successful in career in business in for example even deals because we are people we are not logical we are biological creatures and that is why physical attractiveness makes one look more trustworthy as a business partner or as for example if you are an investor you are more likely to invest in a physically attractive or in other words a conventionally beautiful person's business or project even if their business model is weaker in many respects than the other person who is not maybe as attractive. Sounds like a sad thing to me.

samples.question: What about you?
samples.transcript: It is a negative development because truly there are geniuses who may not objectively look physically attractive but their ideas are worth millions and billions of dollars but because of the way that we are wired they may not have the same opportunity or they might have to work a lot harder than their more attractive counterparts. So we may state that the society may be losing a lot of geniuses because of this conception. Thank you very much. That is the end of the speaking test.
